Description_lang: $?s403631[Breath of Eons][Deep Breath] reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by $459574s1 and increases its damage by $459574s2% for $459574d after you land.

description_blz.en_US: Deep Breath reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by 1 and increases its damage by 10% for 15 sec after you land.
description_blz.es_MX: Aliento profundo reduce 1 p. el costo de esencia de Erupción y aumenta un 10% su daño durante 15 s después de que aterrizas.
description_blz.pt_BR: Respiração Profunda reduz em 1 o custo de Essência de Erupção e aumenta em 10% o dano dela por 15 s após você pousar.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Tiefer Atem' verringert die Essenzkosten von 'Eruption' um 1 und erhöht dessen Schaden nach Eurer Landung 15 Sek. lang um 10%.
description_blz.en_GB: Deep Breath reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by 1 and increases its damage by 10% for 15 sec after you land.
description_blz.es_ES: Aliento profundo reduce 1 p. el coste de esencia de Erupción y aumenta un 10% su daño durante 15 s una vez que aterrizas.
description_blz.fr_FR: Souffle profond réduit les coûts en essence d’Éruption de 1 et augmente ses dégâts de 10 % pendant 15 s après votre atterrissage.
description_blz.it_IT: Alito del Drago riduce il costo in essenza di Eruzione di 1 e ne aumenta i danni inflitti del 10% per 15 s dopo l'atterraggio.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Глубокий вдох" сокращает затраты сущности на "Извержение" на 1 ед. и увеличивает наносимый им урон на 10% на 15 сек. после приземления.
description_blz.ko_KR: 깊은 숨결 사용 시 착지 후 15초 동안 분출의 정수 소모량이 1만큼 감소하고 공격력은 10%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在你施放深層吐息落地之後，爆發的龍能消耗降低1點，且傷害提高10%，持續15秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 深呼吸在你落地后使喷发的精华消耗减少1点，并使其伤害增加10%，持续15秒。
